meanings.sent1: The worker bees in the hive are nonreproductive.
meanings.sent2: The sterile worker ants are nonreproductive members of the colony.
meanings.sent3: The broken printer was nonreproductive, refusing to print any documents.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned factory stood silent and nonreproductive, a relic of the past.
meanings.sent5: The barren land remained nonreproductive, unable to yield any crops.

meanings.sent1: The nonreproductive research focused on environmental conservation.
meanings.sent2: The zoo's nonreproductive programs aim to protect endangered species.
meanings.sent3: The nonreproductive meeting was filled with discussions on art and culture.
meanings.sent4: The nonreproductive task force tackled issues unrelated to procreation.
meanings.sent5: The nonreproductive activities promoted creativity and innovation.
